name: MyWife
0:
”Alexa tell my wife Erin she is pretty”
”Alexa tell my wife Erin she is sexy”
”Alexa tell my wife set name to Erin”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my wife
des:
This app will help keep your wife aware of your fondness for her, and that your a nerd. 

How to use examples, 
"Alexa tell my wife set name to Erin" optional if you want to set a first name don't set a name it will just use, my wife.
"Alexa tell my wife she is pretty."
"Alexa tell my wife she is sexy", slightly more risqu.é

Everything should be PG, and more funny than offensive. If you have suggestions for lines to add let me know.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
